title: MRA logo
content:
The acronym symbol looks custom made but I'd like to know both the symbol face (if possible) and the text face.

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422054810im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MRA_6697.JPG)

Font: 

 FS Rufus Web Bold. 

Solved By: 

 [osamu](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422054810/http:/typophile.com/user/215937 "View user profile.")
author: RBM

comments.content:
Text is [FS Rufus Web Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422054810/http:/fontdeck.com/font/fsrufusweb/bold).

Logo is custom, as you've said. A number of free fonts in a similar style, but I have not yet found one that I feel is good enough to recommend to you. Most are pretty awful. If come across something I will update you.
